sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Intel ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, Intel registers a 32.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.3%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 16.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 0.8%, and Boeing ( BA ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
